location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Assistant Secretary to Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter from the Accountant General to be communicated by Bruce to Fatima Khanum, widow of Mehedy Ali Khan [Mehdi Ali Khan] in response to an application she made and informing Bruce that if he can negotiate the loan agreement in a private capacity this would be agreeable to Government.Enclosed letter from John Kaye, Accountant-General to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, regarding the conditons made on the loan and the various interest rates and periods applied to the loan.
